metadata.title: Robert Kiyosaki Sells $2.25M in Bitcoin, Moves Profits Into Real-World Businesses
metadata.description: “Rich Dad, Poor Dad” author Robert Kiyosaki revealed on Friday that he sold $2.25 million worth of Bitcoin, redirecting the proceeds into traditional businesses he owns in a bid to boost long-term cash flow. Key Takeaways: Kiyosaki sold $2.25M in BTC and moved the profits into two surgery centers and ...
